nodes.text: The Vainglorious-class cruiser was a warship produced by Rendili StarDrive prior to the Galactic Civil War.
Vainglorious-class cruisers were used by the Stark Commercial Combine during the Stark Hyperspace War.

As of the time of the Galactic Empire, the Vainglorious-class cruiser was considered an outdated starship model. Autochefs from this class were recycled as part of the no-frills interior of the Starlight-class light freighter.
